overview: This is a collection of ten short films.  For each film, 50 x 18" strips of clear film were laid side by side to make a rectangle 18' x 36'. A geometric shape was drawn on each rectangle, and the strips of celluloid were joined to make a film. The sound is created by the image carried over into the optical sound track. -http://lux.org.uk/collection/works/ten-drawings
title: Ten Drawings
